price: ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߤߊ߲߫ ߸ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߘߡߐߢߐ߲ߞߐ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߓߘߎߓߘߍ-ߓߘߎߓߘߍ߫
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
